dc:title: On Simple Prayer
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Praises the simplicity of Bro. Lawrence's way of practicing the presence of God, comparing it to St. Therese's "little way." Sees faith coming through the senses. Calls for an increase in the desire for God in our troubled times.
